channel.title: Abouts on Open Container Initiative
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Open Container Initiative

item.title: About the Open Container Initiative
item.description: The Open Container Initiative (OCI) is a lightweight, open governance structure (project), formed under the auspices of the Linux Foundation, for the express purpose of creating open industry standards around container formats and runtime.

item.title: Leadership
item.description: Leadership Chris Aniszczyk Executive Director Chris Aniszczyk brings more than 20 years experience as The Linux Foundation’s VP of Developer Relations, CTO of CNCF and serves as Executive Director of the Open Container Initiative (OCI).

item.title: Security Disclosure
item.description: We’re extremely grateful for responsible security researchers that report vulnerabilities to us. All reports are thoroughly investigated by OCI maintainers.
